text: The Flu First Appeared In 1918...And It’s Still Around And Won’t Go Away. My Point Is COVID-19 Will Still Be Around And Won’t Go Away. If COVID’s The Case Of Us Not Playing Ball Then The Flu Should Have Been The Case Every Year! LET US PLAY BALL!
